item.title: One More Hug
item.description: My boyfriend and I do this thing I call One More Hug, and it’s one of my favorite things about our relationship. I’m not sure which of us started it, but I remember vividly when we were on a date as I hugged him goodbye, it was so hard to say goodbye. I walked away to my car sadly and put on my seatbelt and heard a tapping at the passenger window.

item.title: Braveheart
item.description: Okay guys, so I watched the movie Braveheart a night or two ago, and I’m a wee bit angry at this thing they call a ‘movie’. If you haven’t watched it, I highly DO NOT recommend, because it is sad and angering. But for those of you who haven’t watched it, there are basically 8 steps to the plot. There’s a dude named William Wallace. He likes a girl.

item.title: You
item.description: Wanting you is my addiction Caring for you is my job Missing you is my hobby Being with you is my joy Making you happy is my heart Loving you is my soul

item.title: To You
item.description: Dear you, Thank you for making my life better. Thank you for always being there. I feel like whenever my world starts to fall apart, I’m honored to have someone like you to help me put the pieces back together. It makes me happy when we stay up late together (mom, if you’re reading this, I have never once stayed up late on the phone! Whaaat??) and when we meet up, even if it’s only for a few minutes.

item.title: Code HS
item.description: I hate this class…

item.title: Seventeen
item.description: I’m gonna be seventeen soon. Tomorrow, actually, for those of you who may read this in the nearby future. I’m seventeen, but I still haven’t done anything I wanted to do yet. I haven’t been around the world, gotten my own pet, gotten my license, or gotten a real job. What’s one more year in this existence? Abbie, Over and out

item.title: My Only Star
item.description: Whenever you’re upset or hurting, I just want to hold you close and remind you everything will be okay. Maybe it isn’t right now, but I swear to you, in the end, it will be. And I’ll be here until then Abbie Over and out

item.title: Just a Little... Nope, a Lot.
item.description: So yeah, maybe it hurts Just a little, just a lot Maybe it hurts too much sometimes Just a little. Just a lot. I remember times we had. Hugs in the parking lot? Maybe it hurts too much sometimes Just a little. Just a lot. You leave again and again Turning around on the spot Maybe it hurts so much sometimes Just a little. Just a lot. You blocked me, how is that fair?

item.title: Testing
item.description: Testing this folder.

item.title: How Many Stars
item.description: Baby, can you tell me how many Stars are in the sky? Tell me how many Or even try My love for you is bigger Than the ocean is deep I love you awake I love you asleep I love you to the stars And over the moon I love you far away I love you so soon I love you deep I love you wide I love you with me

item.title: My Baby
item.description: Okay, so I’m not insane. There’s a really pretty ring I found on Amazon, but it’s like thirty bucks and so I can’t afford it but it’s got a sunflower on it and says “You Are My Sunshine” and I love it more than life itself. So… Note to future self… https://www.amazon.com/Sterling-Silver-Sunshine-Sunflower-Adjustable/dp/B07RLD2DV1/ref=sr_1_1_sspa?dchild=1&keywords=sunflower+ring&qid=1589134401&sr=8-1-spons&psc=1&spLa=ZW5jcnlwdGVkUXVhbGlmaWVyPUE2REdNVzcxNklZMjcmZW5jcnlwdGVkSWQ9QTAzMzk1OTczMlpJSEJJOVZROUw1JmVuY3J5cHRlZEFkSWQ9QTAwMDQ4MTQySUZDUUY1MUZURlpLJndpZGdldE5hbWU9c3BfYXRmJmFjdGlvbj1jbGlja1JlZGlyZWN0JmRvTm90TG9nQ2xpY2s9dHJ1ZQ== Size eight. Buy it, future Abbie. Abbie Over and out

item.title: My Baby
item.description: My baby Has a sunflower in the middle Silver and gold bb SHE IS MY BABY I’m not weird It’s a ring I want Size eight, my baby Even better than Gerard Butler You are my sunshine Bb Abbie Over and out

item.title: Anger
item.description: I cry tears that aren’t sad Let them burn and burn The tears are here because I’m mad Cuz I’m not weak No, I’m not weak I shake and scream at the sky Let him burn and burn! The screams can’t reach the sky Cuz I’m not weak No, I’m not weak I shut the whole world out Please go burn and burn The world isn’t in my hands? Maybe I’m weak

item.title: Bill Nye
item.description: If there’s a Bill Nye the Science Guy, there should be a June Pearl the Science Girl. I rest my case. -Abbie Over and out

item.title: The Dreaded AP Biology Test
item.description: The day had finally come. I was testing by myself, with a beady-eyed old lady who looked like she could easily cut off my hands. She pointed at my chair, and I sat down promptly, and began to remember all the things I did, or perhaps didn’t do to prepare for the Advanced Placement Biology Exam. I remembered the girl with the long brown hair and the girl with the obnoxiously red hair.

item.title: Wishes
item.description: Sometimes when people ask me to make a wish I fumble for the right words to say I don’t know if I should tell the truth I want someone to stay Because what if I were to tell them? What do you think they’d do? If I were to say I make each wish for you?

item.title: Letter to Him
item.description: Dear you, Do you know what you’ve done to me? My favorite lies came from your lips. My favorite distractions from your words. My favorite songs from your silence. I’ve been thinking a lot about silence, actually. You sure have given me a lot of it, haven’t you? Given me things to think about. I used to constantly say “easier said than done” but silence is easier done than said.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: At this point, I am currently testing my ability to post to my website. This is test one. -Abbie Over and out

item.title: Letter One to Mikhail
item.description: Dear Mikhail, Hi tiger! Thank you so much for helping me! I appreciate it! Abbie Over and Out

item.title: A Test of the Github Software
item.description: There once was a girl named Abbie She lived and was sorta crabby Then she made a blog Something something dog This is a test, don’t stab me

item.title: Testing My Website
item.description: I am now testing my website. Thanks for looking at my first post! We have a long way to go, but I’m excited to see where this goes! Credit to my amazing best friend, Mikhail, for teaching me everything I needed to know to put this together. I couldn’t have done this without him! He made this process fun and exciting instead of boring and confusing. I owe it all to him!
